body.paragraph: mahāvaṃse 33-paricchede 37-gāthāto paṭṭhāyamahāvaṃse 33, 78-gāthāa. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.130; vibha. aṭṭha. 810pārā. aṭṭha. 2.585. Evaṃ dubbhikkharaṭṭhakkhobhupaddavehi pīḷitattā duddharasamayepi dhammavinayaṃ sakkaccaṃ dhārayiṃsu.
mahāvaṃse 33, 79-gāthādīsu. nikāyasaṅgahe. Tato paṭṭhāya sīhaḷadīpe mahāvihāravāsī, abhayagirivāsīti dve nikāyājātā. Idaṃ tāva sīhaḷadīpe sāsanaparihāniyā paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
